summary: Seymour's happy New York existence comes to a tragic end after he witnesses the murder of his mother, a renowned civil rights activist. When he finds a firearm in the home of his best friend, he embarks on a deranged quest for revenge.
cast: John Leguizamo|Rosie Perez|Julie Carmen|Cliff Gorman|Michael Rapaport|Marisa Tomei|Justin Pierce|Annabella Sciorra|Judy Reyes|Richie Perez|Ian 'Blaze' Kelly|Rafael Nunez|Malcolm Barrett|Raymond Vincente|Yan Ming|Rosario Dawson|Seth Zvi Rosenfeld|Ranjit Chowdhry|William Prael|Scott Cohen|Jason Andrews|Jerry Dean|Eddie Hands|Sixto Ramos|Carmen Serano|Bill Cwikowski|Rebecca Cohen|Sheila Edmondson|Sven Holmberg|Lisa Scarola|Gabe Castillo|Pedro Coiscou|George F. Miller
keywords: downward spiral|new york city|lesbian mother|gay parent|revenge
title: King of the Jungle
